title: Cant not long into league for over 2 weeks now need help!
body: I have been trying to log into league for over 2 weeks now and keep receiving server not responding message. Ive reinstalled the client reset my internet turned off firewalls and nothing has worked i wrote in tickets but have gotten no response.

replies.body: It sounds like the issue here may be with your network, so reinstalling game files might not necessarily fix this.  Your network may be having problems establishing a connection to our servers, and I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed up.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to configure other settings like your firewalls.  Hopefully, this gets you back in game!
